message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering purchasing our product. We're excited to work with you. After careful consideration, we're willing to offer you the product for $800,000. We believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, $800,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to pay $700,000 for the product. This reflects the value I see in it and allows for a reasonable profit margin for both of us.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After re-evaluating our pricing strategy, we're willing to meet you halfway. We're offering the product to you for $750,000. This price takes into account your concerns while still reflecting the value the product brings to your business.
